content.html: Frankly, after a truly wonderful year of some career-highlight level speaking gigs, this was a disappointing and saddening way to end the year. I feel weighed down by everything I've heard and exceptionally stupid to have been fooled into marketing this event.
content.value:
Frankly, after a truly wonderful year of some career-highlight level speaking gigs, this was a disappointing and saddening way to end the year.

I feel weighed down by everything I've heard and exceptionally stupid to have been fooled into marketing this event.
